repo.description: Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability
repo.name: neovim

body:
Problem:  Error messages that cause a vim.ui_attach() namespace to
          detach are not visible in the message history. Decoration
          provider and vim.ui_attach error messages are dissimilar.
Solution: Emit vim.ui_attach() errors as an actual message in addition
          to logging it. Adjust error message format.

Fix #32917

comment_data.body: Replying to your deleted comment @justinmk. Yes maybe this is a reasonable field format actually, it looked like a typo to me in the source😅
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -767,16 +768,16 @@ describe('decorations providers', function()
     end
     ]]
 
-    screen:expect{grid=[[
-      {2:Error in decoration provider ns1.start:} |

comment_data.body: I kind of like it, but not sure if that pattern is understood by many. The `(ns=...)` is probably a more broadly useful pattern for now.
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -767,16 +768,16 @@ describe('decorations providers', function()
     end
     ]]
 
-    screen:expect{grid=[[
-      {2:Error in decoration provider ns1.start:} |

comment_regular_data.body: off-topic: all errors should probably be logged to NVIM_LOG_FILE by default. That would avoid the redundant ILOG calls in this case.
Not sure if the same error should be reported 10 times, but it's definitely better than no details what's happened.

> Not sure if the same error should be reported 10 times, but it's definitely better than no details what's happened.

yeah I was wondering why more than 1 error is ever allowed in a decor provider :) off-topic for this pr though.

I changed it from 10 to 3, matching decoration providers. ~~Still not sure why CI fails, it passes locally.~~ 

Oh, the CI builds do not define `NVIM_LOG_DEBUG`... I guess we use `ELOG` for both of these then?

We may need to set a local NVIM_LOG_FILE in these tests (and use `assert_log()`), to avoid noise in the CI logs. https://github.com/neovim/neovim/actions/runs/13989818285/job/39171064521

```
 1 FAILED TEST
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
$NVIM_LOG_FILE: /Users/runner/work/neovim/neovim/build/.nvimlog
(last 100 lines)
ERR 2025-03-21T10:41:45.899 T3659.25283.0 ui_attach_error:719: Error in "msg_show" UI event handler (ns=(UNKNOWN PLUGIN)):
fast context failure
Error executing lua: [string "<nvim>"]:3: attempt to index global 'err' (a nil value)
stack traceback:
	[string "<nvim>"]:3: in function <[string "<nvim>"]:1>
ERR 2025-03-21T10:41:45.906 T3659.25283.0 ui_attach_error:719: Error in "msg_clear" UI event handler (ns=(UNKNOWN PLUGIN)):
```

repo.description: Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability

title: fix(log): unify error messages for vim.ui_attach/decor providers
